name: Broodmother
title: Black Arachnia
lore: For thousands of years, Black Arachnia the Broodmother has dwelt in her silken palace among the ruins.

insatiableHunger.name: Insatiable Hunger
insatiableHunger.description: Broodmother enters a ravenous state, gaining bonus damage and lifesteal.

silkenBola.name: Silken Bola
silkenBola.description: Throws bolas at enemies, rooting and dealing damage over time.

spinWeb.name: Spin Web
spinWeb.description: Spins a web that grants invisibility, movement speed, and regeneration to Broodmother.

spawnSpiderlings.name: Spawn Spiderlings
spawnSpiderlings.description: Spits venom at a target. If the target dies while debuffed, spiderlings spawn.
